name: DUNGEROUS
description:
♛ Have you ever been so mad you wanted to destroy everything that cross your path?  ➥ ╭                         Have you ever thought of becoming the KING conquering dangerous dungeons that will make you feel powerful? Be welcome to DUNGEROUS, a roguelike that will make you feel the BOSS!       ⸻    ⭑

⤹  

➵ Incredible graphics made with Voxel! ➵ Variety of enemys to be punished! ➵ Lots of equipment and weapons of your choice! ➵ Make your way to defeat all the bad guys with your own builds! 「 ✶ Movement: WASD ✶ Attack: Left click ✶ Grab things with F; and throw them with Q and E 」 CREDITS

Character design and modeling: Alicia Martos (AliciaMartos) & Marta Casado (geemini)

UI:  Alicia Martos (AliciaMartos)

Props: Alejandro Biedma (AressOul) & Rubén Vico (RubenVico27)

Weapons and level design: Javier Roncero (akai25)

Programming and in-game animation: Sebastián Moreno (smorenom) & Francisco José Murillo (fjmm_01)
